column1: Kannod is a town situated in Malwa region of Madhya Pradesh
column2: India. It is surrounded by the Vindhya Range from three sides. It is well connected with Indore

column1: The ancient name of Kannod was Kannar which was adopted from the name of King Kanna. Kanna was the king of the Gond community.

column2: Kannod: Kannod had a population of 17
column3: 575. Males constitute 51.20% of the population and females 48.80%. Kannod has an average literacy rate of 63%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 72%
column5: and female literacy is 53%. In Kannod
column6: 15% of the population is under 6 years of age.

column1: Mr Ashish sharma is the current MLA
Kannod has no rail connectivity. The nearest important railway station is Indore Junction railway station and Harda railway station.
The nearest airport is Bhopal and Devi Ahilyabai Holkar Airport
